name: ZIP & ZAP
description:
ZIP & ZAP!

A little Player vs. CPU wizard battle!

Fight against the evil wizard!

Shoot the bottles, so they explode on his side!

Destroy his spells with yours or even counter them with some quick reaction!

Made for the Mini Jame Gam #8

Music coming soon.

Code/SFX: Micha Henry

Artwork: Roxxea

Free 2D FX by Inguz Media
